name: Assaye 1803
description:
The battle of Assaye is the first major battle commanded by Arthur Wellesley (Duke of Wellington). The game itself is a traditional hex wargame using pure  DOM only (aka. canvas free) technique, which way is low performed and limited but fun to explore. 

Phase:

Ready: Choose AI to run this turn or the player to run this turn.

Move: move your counters.

Combat: click units to "match" combat. Click "do it" to resolve the combat. The defender is eliminated or routed, an attacker unit can choose a unit to pursue into the attacked hex.

GitHub:

https://github.com/yiyuezhuo/Hex-Wargame-JavaScript
